Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka has lost three straight games in the tournament.
The Netherlands registered their first win after defeating South Africa.
The Dutch batting may be their biggest concern with the top-order failing to score runs.
The bowling has looked good with the likes of Logan van Beek, Roelof van der Merwe, and Aryan Dutt performing well.
The Sri Lankan team has had a forgettable tournament with three back-to-back losses.
The batting has had a few great performances but has lacked consistency.
The bowling has severely lacked control and failed to pick up wickets at regular intervals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow has produced balanced tracks with an average score of 226.
The pitch slows down and grips as the day goes through, favoring bowlers.
